selector.description: The selector to use for selecting entities. It can be the username of a player, the UUID of the entity or a target selector.
selector.markdownDescription: The selector to use for selecting entities. It can be the username of a player, the UUID of the entity or a target selector.

bientity_action.description: If specified, this action will be executed on either or both the '**actor**' and '**target**' entities.
bientity_action.markdownDescription: If specified, this action will be executed on either or both the '**actor**' and '**target**' entities.

bientity_condition.description: If specified, the specified action will only be executed if this condition is fulfilled by either or both the '**actor**' and '**target**' entities.
bientity_condition.markdownDescription: If specified, the specified action will only be executed if this condition is fulfilled by either or both the '**actor**' and '**target**' entities.

type.description:
[Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/selector_action)

Executes an action on entities selected by a target selector.

Type ID: `origins:selector_action`


!!! note

    See [Minecraft Wiki: Target selectors](https://minecraft.wiki/w/Target_selectors) for more information about target selectors.

!!! note

    This entity action type has a bi-entity action context, where the '**actor**' entity is the entity that invoked the entity action while the '**target**' entities are the entities that were selected by the specified `selector`.
type.markdownDescription:
[Entity Action Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/entity_action_types/selector_action)

Executes an action on entities selected by a target selector.

Type ID: `origins:selector_action`


!!! note

    See [Minecraft Wiki: Target selectors](https://minecraft.wiki/w/Target_selectors) for more information about target selectors.

!!! note

    This entity action type has a bi-entity action context, where the '**actor**' entity is the entity that invoked the entity action while the '**target**' entities are the entities that were selected by the specified `selector`.
